Meet [SkylonHost](https://skylonhost.com). Started in February 2018, SkylonHost focuses on providing reliable **high performance** hosting services and offering great value for an attractive price.

Our offer: High performance KVM-based VPS with dedicated CPU power (VDS).  

These VPS are perfect for applications which constantly (ab)use lots of CPU power, for example game servers. Backed by the excellent OVH infrastructure, these servers also feature a very capable DDOS protection.  

We trust you will be happy with our services. If not, we are willing to give you a full refund within 14 days, no questions asked!

---

**DEDI-SSD-02GB**  
CPU: 1 core of Xeon E3 @ 3.5 GHz, 50% dedicated  
RAM: 2GB RAM  
Hard Drive: 12GB SSD, RAID protected  
IPs: 1x IPv4 and /80 IPv6  
Bandwidth: 2TB @ 250Mbps  
Technology: KVM, Virtualizor  
Location: France, OVH (DDOS protected)  
  

Price: <del>10€/month</del> 6€/month recurring, paid monthly  
Promo code: **LET06**  
Order link: https://clients.skylonhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1  
  
Benchmark: https://serverscope.io/trials/4Rl6  
  

6€ = 7 USD  

---

**Information:**  

* The price does not include VAT, which will be automatically added to all orders from EU customers.
* Looking glass: [https://skylonhost.com/lg.html](https://skylonhost.com/lg.html)
* Read the [Terms of Service](https://skylonhost.com/terms-of-service.html) please
* 14 days no-question refund policy (details in ToS)
* **99.9%+ SLA**

**CPU usage policy:**  
**Feel free to max out the CPU 100% of the time**. We guarantee that you will be able to get at least 50% processing power of a single E3 core on this plan.

**Affiliate program**  
SkylonHost has a generous affiliate program. For every person who signs up to our services using your affiliate link we will grant you a 10% recurring commission. More information available [here](https://skylonhost.com/affiliate.html)

**Bandwidth policy:**  
After exhausting your bandwidth allocation your server will be limited to 10Mbps both ways till the end of the monthly period. Open a ticket to discuss the possibility of buying more bandwidth if needed.

[Acceptable use Policy](https://skylonhost.com/acceptable-use-policy.html)  
TL;DR; No warez, no mass mailing (we make exceptions), no shoes, no adult stuff (contact us, we can make an exception), no TOR/I2P exits. **Gaming allowed, mining allowed**, personal VPN allowed.

  
**Payment methods:**

* PayPal, VISA/MasterCard  
* Cryptocurrencies (CoinPayments.net)  
* Contact us for alternatives (e.g. SEPA)
